thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Ultimate Software Group Reports Q4 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $1.11

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ultimate Software Group Reports Q4 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $1.11
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Ultimate Software Group Inc:
* ULTIMATE REPORTS FULL YEAR AND Q4 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.11 * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.07 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 19 PERCENT TO $251.4 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 ‍RECURRING REVENUES OF APPROXIMATELY $229 MILLION TO $231 MILLION​
* ULTIMATE SOFTWARE GROUP - SEES Q1 2018 TOTAL REVENUES OF APPROXIMATELY $269 MILLION TO $272 MILLION
* SEES 2018 ‍RECURRING REVENUES TO INCREASE IN EXCESS OF 20% OVER 2017​
* SEES 2018 ‍TOTAL REVENUES TO INCREASE IN EXCESS OF 18% OVER 2017​
* ULTIMATE SOFTWARE GROUP - SEES Q1 2018 OPERATING MARGIN, ON NON-GAAP BASIS, OF APPROXIMATELY 18%
* SEES 2018 ‍OPERATING MARGIN, ON A NON-GAAP BASIS IN EXCESS OF 21%​
* ULTIMATE SOFTWARE GROUP - ‍AS A RESULT OF STATUTORY RATE DECREASES FROM TAX REFORM, CO HAD A REDUCTION IN NET DEFERRED TAX ASSET BALANCE OF $8.7 MILLION FOR Q4 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
